Key:
Ah. Class is over. Now, I gotta think of what
to do after schoool. Hm...?
Oh, Onii-chan! Hey! Hey!
Kotori? What are you doing at my school?
I needed to talk to Reine. I'm about to head home.
I see... Oh? Your ribbon... it's white today?
Yup.

(I haven't seen that in a while.
Her carefree way about her right now...
It feels kind of nostalgic.)

And you're dressed like that out seeing
Reine-san. What are you trying to pull?

If you're always so nervous like that,
one day you're going to pop.
I see...
Is there a problem?

Oh no, no...
I'm glad you're having fun, Kotori.
Hm? What's the matter?
I've always wanted to ask you, Onii-chan...
What is it?

Which version of me do you like better?
The me now or when I'm at the control room?

(What?! Wait... why is she asking me which
version of her I like better? Hm...)
U-Uh...
The light Kotori.
The dark Kotori.
I like them both the same.
If I were to choose, I'd say you now...
Really? Why do you say that?
What do you mean why... Well your version now won't leave a deep scar in my heart.

When I see you in your light mode, I feel like we're
in the goold old days. I remember when we were
kids and life was so easy.
So you have a weird sister complex.
What?! Sister complex?!

Also, why are you thinking of when we
were young? Isn't that weird to you?
What? No, wait, I'm talking about...
Nice! My brother has a weird sister complex!
Hey! Wait! That's not true at all!
...Why?! I thought light Kotori would never hurt me!

I... I don't mind the you now but I guess I don't mind the
pretty hard words you say when you're at Ratatoskr.

So, that makes you a super masochistic hentai man
who gets excited with hardcore things?
Huh? Wait! How did you come up with that?

What a let down, Onii-chan! I'm going to reconsider
how I deal with you from now on!
Wait, that's not what I meant.
Ah! My brother is a super masochistic hentai guy!
No! I'm not!
Honestly, I can't choose.
Hm. Why?

Well, either way, you're still my little sister.
I like you whatever type of person you are.
O-Onii-chan... who told you to say that?
I don't like that! I like any version of you, got it?

H-Hm. You putting it to words like that
is gonna make me blush.

Well... I guess I'm embarrassed
saying it, too, but it's the truth.
Nwaaaah?! W-Well, let's do this again soon! Bye!
What the? Kotori's so weird...
